OBJECTIVE 18-1 Discuss the need to understand competitors as well as customers through competitor analysis.
Competitor Analysis (pp 542–549)
OBJECTIVE 18-2 Explain the fundamentals of competitive marketing strategies based on creating value for customers.
Competitive Strategies (pp 549–559)
OBJECTIVE 18-3 Illustrate the need for balancing customer and competitor orientations in becoming a truly market-centered organization.
Balancing Customer and Competitor Orientations (pp 559–560)
summary_markdown: This content outlines three key objectives related to understanding and responding to the competitive landscape in marketing. Objective 18-1 emphasizes the necessity of competitor analysis, highlighting its role alongside customer understanding in strategic planning. Objective 18-2 focuses on the foundational principles of competitive marketing strategies, specifically how they are built upon delivering customer value. Finally, Objective 18-3 addresses the crucial balance required between focusing on customers and competitors to achieve a truly market-centered organizational approach. The structure suggests a progression from understanding the competitive environment to developing strategies and then integrating these insights into a holistic market orientation.
